document_data.name: Myrian Beechwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Myrian Beechwood''' was the provisional lord of [[Scardale]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Myrian needed to subject most of his actions to the [[Parliament of Advisors]], composed of representatives of the occupying powers.
document_data.History: Once Myrian was an adventurer priest of [[Waukeen]]. After [[Lashan Aumersair]]'s demise, he did so much for the poor people of the dale that the occupying forces offered him the provisional lordship. To the surprise of all, himself included, he remained in office until 1368 DR, despite growing tired and angry from the conflict in the Parliament.
